reviews.review: Появился привкус члена во рту,когда зашёл в игру.
I went out of silver for two days

Honestly this game has brought me so many memories over the years, and I'm grateful that i experienced it. Making games fun with randoms and everything brought me to love this game even more, and especially the competitive aspect of it. Although you have toxic players here and there, it is still one of my favorite games of all time.

rate 10/10
I wish I wasn't bad at this game
pretty goood game tbh alot of friendly people
This game is trash. Play Rainbow 6 its a much better game

It's pretty difficult to write a review on this game since there are so many elements to take into account. So, instead of wasting my time typing out an essay, I'm going to encourage you to watch funny YouTubers play this game. This way you can familarize yourself with the mechanics.

As for the community... Well, if you like the "PCMasterRace" community, then this game is just right for you.
Es el counter, no puede fallar...
This game never get's old! An intense tactical shooter.
The New Operation is a big fat joke
Esse jogo é simplesmente fantástico, 7 anos jogando e não tem como enjoar
Jogo com gráficos bons, peca em alguns aspectos de fazer atualização se esquecendo de pessoas com computador fraco. Ainda assim é um ótimo jogo.
jogo intoxicado de hacks pior anti cheat do mundo !!
i play wingman when im bored, some shooting mechanics suck *cough* glock *cough* but its still good
It's a very fun game and I like it a lot.
Ótimo jogo e bom para jogar com os amiguinho prata ruim!

it's a fun multiplayer game, but community is super toxic which can sometimes be funny other times super annoying. The game is prone to hackers but I always kick them from my tea/ report them. I payed for the game when it costed money but now it's free.
A great and fun strategic shooter, while i'm not the best at it i have lots of fun

Мировой шедевр! Еще бы анти чит!
Jogo muito bom ao longo do tempo sofreu varias alteraçoes que melhoraram o desempenho e a jogabilidade alem de clara a estetica. Hiper recomendo

Its kind of annoying that I cant scope in on all guns without a actual scope. And there is no sprinting and no hold to scope on snipers which makes it really hard to quick scope or switch to other gun fast... There is not much customization to gameplay settings.. All in all its not horrible but TBH i'd rather play older Call of Duties!

all in all 10/10 game! would recommend!
